keyMoments.title: Creates White-Barbed Iron Deathmatch
keyMoments.description: Ohm commands Holy to trigger the pressure plates that release Iron Cloud barbed wire, creating a massive dome cage that traps all combatants with no escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ohm's ultimate technique and strategic mastery of the battlefield.
keyMoments.quote: This is the ultimate test of the Ordeal of Iron - the White-Barbed Iron Deathmatch!

keyMoments.title: Iron Cloud Abilities Displayed
keyMoments.description: Ohm demonstrates the full versatility of his Iron Cloud weapon, morphing it between whip, wall, and various forms during combat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows why Ohm is one of Enel's strongest priests with his unique fighting style.
keyMoments.quote: Iron Cloud is the perfect weapon - it has the hardness of steel but moves like the wind.

keyMoments.title: Mantra Ability Revealed
keyMoments.description: Ohm reveals he possesses Mantra (Observation Haki), allowing him to sense opponents' movements even through obstacles.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ohm as a formidable opponent who can predict attacks.
keyMoments.quote: With Mantra, I can sense every movement you make. There is no escape.

abilities.description: Allows Ohm to sense opponents' locations and movements even through walls.
A dome of barbed wire Iron Cloud that traps all combatants in an inescapable cage.
Extends his Iron Cloud sword as a whip for long-range attacks.
Forms his Iron Cloud sword into a solid wall for defense.

relationships.description: Ohm's loyal dog companion who fights alongside him using martial arts.
Serves Enel as one of his four priests.

reveals.information: Can create the White-Barbed Iron Deathmatch cage

keyMoments.title: Watches Raki's Defeat Helplessly
keyMoments.description: Wyper is trapped behind the barbed wire cage as Enel defeats Raki. In his rage and frustration, he grabs the iron wires with his bare hands, cutting himself.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Wyper's emotional depth and his deep care for his fellow Shandian warriors.

keyMoments.title: Four Hundred Years of Hate
keyMoments.description: The episode emphasizes that Wyper carries four hundred years of accumulated Shandian anger and grief, representing generations who lost their homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial context for Wyper's behavior throughout the arc, showing his rage stems from historical injustice.

keyMoments.title: Clashes with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Wyper and Zoro fight each other as both race toward Nola to rescue their trapped allies, despite having common enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the fractured nature of the resistance and Wyper's single-minded determination.
keyMoments.quote: Get out of my way! I'm going to save Aisa!

relationships.description: Fellow Shandian warrior whose defeat by Enel deeply affects Wyper.

evolutionMoments.description: Wyper's desperate reaction to Raki's defeat shows how much he cares for his fellow warriors.

relationships.description: Wyper is concerned for Aisa's safety when she's swallowed by Nola.

reveals.information: Carries the weight of four hundred years of Shandian history and displacement

keyMoments.title: Confronts Enel with Rifle
keyMoments.description: Raki attempts to shoot Enel with her rifle, but the bullets pass harmlessly through his Logia body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power gap between normal warriors and Logia users.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Enel
keyMoments.description: Enel electrocutes Raki, leaving her unconscious as Wyper watches helplessly from behind the barbed wire.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Enel's ruthlessness and the stakes of the conflict.

relationships.description: Fellow Shandian warrior. Wyper is devastated when she's defeated.

keyMoments.title: Clashes with Wyper
keyMoments.description: Zoro fights with Wyper as both race toward Nola, their lack of coordination preventing cooperation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the chaotic nature of the battlefield where even allies clash.
keyMoments.quote: I don't have time for this - Nami and the old man are in that snake!

keyMoments.title: Decides to Fight Ohm First
keyMoments.description: Zoro strategically decides to defeat Ohm before attempting to rescue Nami and Gan Fall, recognizing the need to eliminate the threat first.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's tactical maturity and strategic thinking in combat.
keyMoments.quote: I can't save anyone if you're in my way. I'll finish you off first!

keyMoments.title: Found Inside Nola's Stomach
keyMoments.description: Luffy is discovered inside Nola's stomach, and it's revealed that his fighting and movement is causing the snake to rampage across Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Typical Luffy moment where his oblivious antics cause chaos. Explains Nola's erratic behavior.
keyMoments.quote: Oh hey guys! I was wondering where everyone went!

keyMoments.title: Trapped in Nola's Stomach
keyMoments.description: Nami finds herself inside Nola's stomach with Gan Fall and Aisa, searching for a way to escape.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the secondary location for events and character interactions.
keyMoments.quote: We need to find a way out of here before we get digested!

keyMoments.title: Discovers Luffy Causing Rampage
keyMoments.description: Nami realizes that Luffy's presence inside Nola is what's been causing the snake to rampage violently.
keyMoments.significance: Classic Nami frustration at Luffy's obliviousness causing problems.
keyMoments.quote: YOU'RE the reason this snake is going crazy?!

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Logia Invincibility
keyMoments.description: Raki's bullets pass harmlessly through Enel's lightning body, demonstrating his Logia Devil Fruit invincibility to physical attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the overwhelming power gap between Enel and normal fighters.
keyMoments.quote: You think such primitive weapons can harm a god?

keyMoments.title: Defeats Raki with Lightning
keyMoments.description: Enel electrocutes Raki, leaving her unconscious in front of the helpless Wyper.

keyMoments.title: Trapped in Nola's Stomach
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall finds himself inside Nola's stomach along with Nami and Aisa.
keyMoments.significance: Groups the characters together for the escape subplot.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Luffy Inside Nola
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall is present when the group discovers Luffy is the cause of Nola's rampage.
keyMoments.significance: Contributes to the realization about the snake's behavior.

keyMoments.title: Swallowed by Nola
keyMoments.description: Aisa is inside Nola's stomach with Nami and Gan Fall, having been swallowed by the giant snake.
keyMoments.significance: Her presence motivates Wyper to act, showing their connection.

abilities.description: Born with the ability to sense others' presence and emotions across vast distances.

relationships.description: Wyper is concerned for Aisa's safety when she's trapped in Nola.
